title: Why can't hippos climb trees?
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Rob McCubbin and Education Department of Victoria for Zoo Education Services
brief_description: Gaye Hamilton, a zoo education officer and Year 11 students from Braybrook High School examine the different structures of animals that enable them to survive. Using video inserts and live animals in the studio they discover the adaptations of animals that enable them to live in trees, in water or on the ground.
